author: pieterdavid
body:
#### PR description:

Following the changes in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33888 I put `SiStripDetInfoFileReader::kDefaultfile` everywhere we had the hard-coded path, and replaced `SiStripDetInfoFileReader` by a method that reads a file and constructs a `SiStripDetInfo` instance, which simplifies the code in a few places.
I added this reader method as `SiStripDetInfoFileReader::read`, but maybe `kDefaultFile` and `read` could be made static members of `SiStripDetInfo` to simplify things further? Would that be compatible with naming and code rules?

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, matrix tests run without errors.

CC: @robervalwalsh @mdelcourt @mmusich @tsusa
title: SiStripDetInfoFileReader refactoring and cleanup
